name: The Immortal Stone
description:
Join Liam Callahan, an unlikely treasure hunter,  on an adventure to find The Immortal Stone said to grant eternal life to those who posses it. 

To move, you will use either the arrow keys or W,A,S,D and holding shift when walking will make it easier for you to push boxes.

I created this game as a part of my coursework, mainly focusing on level design than gameplay.
